pages.text: naega bicheonhan mullobuteo geudaedeul-eul changjohaji anh-assdeonga
geu hu naneun geugeos-eul hwaggohan jeongchagjie dueoss-euni
iljeonghan gigankkajila
geuleohge naega jojeolhayeoss-euni eolmana hullyunghi jojeolhaneun jainga
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
naega daejileul geuleus-eulo duji anh-assdeonga
sal-aissneun jadeulgwa jug-eun jadeul-eul wiham-ila
geuligo naneun geugos(daeji)e uttug sos-eun dandanhan san-eul dueossgo geudaedeul-i dalkomhan mul-eul masidolog hayeossnola
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
“geudaedeul-i bujeonghadeon geos-eul hyanghae gil-eul tteonala”
“se gaeui deong-eolilo doen eodum-eul hyanghae gil-eul tteonala”
(geu eodum-eneun) geuneuldo eobsgo bulgil-eul mag-ajujido anhnola
sillo geugeos(jiog)eun seongluwado gat-eun bulkkochdeul-eul naebaet-euni
geugeos(bulkkoch)eun machi hwangsaeg-ui nagtadeulgwa gatdeola
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
i nal-eun geudeul-i mal-eul haji moshaneun nal-imyeo
geudeul-ege byeonmyeonghal gihoedo heolagdoeji anh-eul geos-ila
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
i nal-eun bunliui nalloseo naega geudaedeulgwa ijeon salamdeul-eul moassnola
geuleoni geudaedeul-ege gyelyag-i issdamyeon na-ege gyelyag-eul kkumyeo bola
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
sillo (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eun geuneulgwa umul gyeot-e iss-eul geos-imyeo
geudeul-i meoggo sip-eohaneun gwaildo iss-eul geos-ila
“geudaedeul-eun swii meoggo masila, geudaedeul-i haenghadeon geos-e daehan daegala”
sillo naneun choeseon-eul dahaneun jadeul-eul geuleohge bosanghanola
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
“eolmagan meoggo jeulgila, sillo geudaedeul-eun aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeul-ila”
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geudeul-ege “heolisug-yeo jeolhasio” laneun mogsoliga deullil ttae geudeul-eun heolisug-yeo jeolhaji anhdeola
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geuleohdamyeon geudeul-eun geugeos(kkulan) ioee eotteon malsseum-eul midneundan mal-inga
